text:
And now Anthony Nevarez
has his work cut out for him

to beat her out
for that spot in the semis.

Anthony: Dancing with fire --
it's amazing.

It's the most dangerous partner
to have,

but it's the most beautiful
partner you can be working with.

I'm Native American and I'm
a professional fire dancer.

My mom was a professional
dancer, my grandmother as well.

It's been a tradition,
and it is in my blood,

so I really put my heart
and soul into it.

Tonight, I'll be performing
a fire dance
with up to five hoops

when most people will only use
like one or two.

I've never, ever performed this
on the big stage,

so there is potential for me
to get very seriously burned,
possibly even catch fire.

Here on "The Go-Big Show"
means a lot to me,

to not only represent myself
but represent my culture.
[ Cheers and applause ]
[ Car horns honking ]
There's fire.

Are you wishing you had
put fire in your first act?
Rosario: Is that a rose?

Oh, it is a rose.
It's a flaming rose.
Beautiful.
Oh, ow!
'Bout to rise like a phoenix.

Flaming!
You can play with fire now.

-Oh-ho-ho.
-Yeah!

-He's gonna catch on fire.
-I don't know how he's not.

He's definitely
catching on fire.
Oh! Oh! Almost hit him.

Rosario:
We've seen a lot of people
touch a lot of fire close,

but usually in, like,
flame-retardant.
He's not in anything like that.
Wow!
[ Cheers and applause ]
Wow. There you go.

I-I thought you were
gonna catch on fire.

I'm shocked
you're still here.

Even without the fire,
the dance itself is beautiful.

Can you elaborate a little bit
more about what the story is?

The hoop dance
is a dance of healing.

This hand print is
a universal signal for

missing and murdered
indigenous women.

I do this dance so that
their voices are always heard
and never forgotten.

The whole presentation
of the how and the why

was just really, really
powerful.
So thank you for that.
Cody Rhodes.
The idea of fire dance

is a no brainer
for "Go-Big Show."
A bar was set incredibly high.

That can actually put you
at a disadvantage,

and I definitely want
to see more, for sure.

I do like to add, Cody --
next round,

I'm gonna make it
rain fire.

T-Pain: We got to.
You got to go bigger.

You got to go bigger.
That's it, man.
I'm ready for that.
[ Cheers and applause ]
